mapper.select: SELECT A.company_id , A.recruit_title, A.recruit_detail, A.work_area_id, A.recruit_start_at,A.recruit_end_at, B.member_id , C.member_name FROM recruit_tb AS A JOIN bookmark AS B ON A.recruit_id = B.recruit_id JOIN member_tb AS C ON B.member_id = C.member_id WHERE B.member_id = #{memberId}
